units.body: Now let me get this straight The aliens paralyzed the colonists carried them over there cocooned them to be hosts for more of those

units.body: Yes That follows

units.body: But these things come from eggs so where are all the eggs coming from
units.title: RIPLEY

units.body: That is the question of the hour We could assume a parallel to certain insect forms who have hivelike organization An ant of termite colony for example is ruled by a single female a queen which is the source of new eggs
units.title: BISHOP

units.body: Youre saying one of those things lays all the eggs
units.title: RIPLEY

units.body: Well the queen is always physically larger then the others A termite queens abdomen is so bloated with eggs that it cant move at all It is fed and tended by drone workers defended by the warriors She is the center of their lives quite literally the mother of their society
units.title: BISHOP

units.body: Could it be intelligent
units.title: RIPLEY

units.body: Hard to say It may have been blind instinct attraction to the heat of whatever but she did choose to incubate her eggs in the one spot where we couldnt destroy her without destroying ourselves Thats if she exists of course
